laundry: piles and piles of dirty laundry
socks: a pair of surprisingly clean socks

exits.name: a narrow hallway
exits.description: This empty hallway is just wide enough for one person to walk through.

exits.name: a dirty livingroom
exits.description: This livingroom shows signs of use but none that there was any effort made to keep it clean.

objects.envelope: an envelope of bills with writing on it

exits.name: a small kitchen
exits.description: This kitchen is clean compared to the rest of the house. Aside from the microwave, it doesn't seem see much use.

exits.name: a fenced in yard
exits.description: Though small, this yard is well-kept and healthy. Flowers line the edge of the fence, and a pile of leaves has been left by the door.

exits.name: a small bedroom
exits.description: This tiny bedroom is just big enough for a bed, a dresser, and not much else. The black drapes over the single window do not let in much sunlight.

objects.window: a window covered by black drapes
